explains: n. 《可兰经》，《古兰经》（伊斯兰教）

sentences.en: The transmission began with a recitation from the Koran.
sentences.cn: 该播音以朗诵《可兰经》一个章节开始。

sentences.en: "He greeted me with 'apa kabar, Bapak Presiden' (How are you Mr. President) in fluent Indonesian," Yudhoyono was quoted as saying by the Koran Tempo daily.
sentences.cn: 《可兰日报》援引苏西洛的话说：“他用流利的印尼语问候我'你好吗，总统先生'(apa kabar， Bapak Presiden)。”
